Iron Marionettes

LA Agartha

Bless/Buff: Unholy Power
 
(Affects Demons and Undead [demonundead], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Demons [demonimmune])
This spell is primarily used to boost the power of the Agarthan Iron Corpses, but the spell works on other undead units as well. Any undead affected by this spell will move with great speed and fight with relentless fervor.
Undead are granted Att +4 and Combat speed +4.
